On a bright summer morning, the world awoke to a peculiar sightâ€”the oceans had turned into a shimmering sea of lemonade. Waves of zesty yellow lapped at the shores, and the air was filled with a sweet, citrusy aroma. Curious townsfolk gathered, scooping up cups of the refreshing drink, laughter echoing as children splashed in the sugary surf.
